sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vBasePage
    :searchOptions="searchOptions"
    :buttonOptions="buttonOptions"
    :editOptions="editOptions"
    :tableOption="tableOption"
    @rowBlock="rowClick"
    @componentMountBefore="componentMountBefore"
    @componentMountAfter="componentMountAfter"
    @componentValueChange="componentValueChange"

  ></vBasePage>
</template>

<script>
import vBasePage from "../../BasePage/BasePage";
import NewApi from "../webapi/New";
import config from "@/config/index";

var TableUniqueId = "appId";
var TerminalType = {
  "1": "总控",
  "2": "分控",
  "3": "HubApp",
  "4": "CCN"
};
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      searchOptions: {
        searchOptions: {
          requiredCondition: false
        },
        seleFunc: {
          export: false,
          search: true
        },
        // exportUrl: NewApi.GetAppInfoList,
        search_controls: [
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "部署点",
            key: "OrganiztionId",
            apiUrl: NewApi.GetOrganiztionList,
            //params: { aaa: "fff" },
            selectkey: "organiztionId",
            selectvalue: "organiztionSN"
          },
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "状态",
            key: "isDelete",
            data: [
              {
                typeid: 0,
                typename: "启用"
              },
              {
                typeid: 1,
                typename: "禁用"
              }
            ],
            selectkey: "typeid",
            selectvalue: "typename"
          },
          {
            type: "v_singleSelect",
            title: "设备类型",
            key: "TerminalType",
            data: [
              {
                id: "1",
                value: "总控"
              },
              {
                id: "2",
                value: "分控"
              },
              {
                id: "3",
                value: "HubApp"
              },
              {
                id: "4",
                value: "CCN"
              }
            ],
            selectkey: "id",
            selectvalue: "value"
          }
        ]
      },
      buttonOptions: [
        {
          title: "添加",
          key: "add",
          enable: true,
          iconStr: "fa-plus"
        }
      ],
      editOptions: {
        dynamicEdits: {
          apiUrl: NewApi.SubmitAppInfo,
          // params: {"test": "111"},
          list: [
            {
              lineType: "single",
              rowList: [
                {
                  type: "v_singleSelect",
                  title: "部署点",
                  key: "organiztionId",
                  apiUrl: NewApi.GetOrganiztionList,
                  hasValChange: true,
                  //params: { aaa: "fff" },
                  selectkey: "organiztionId",
                  selectvalue: "organiztionSN"
                },
                {
                  type: "v_text",
                  title: "AppSecret",
                  key: "appSecret",
                  isRequest: true,
                  editDisabled: true, //编辑环境下是否禁用
                  addDisabled: true, //添加环境下是否禁用
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "AppSecret不能为空"
                    },
                    regexp: {
                      regexp: /^[A-Za-z0-9]+$/i,
                      message: "AppKey只能由字母字符和数字组成"
                    },
                    stringLength: {
                      max: 50,
                      message: "AppSecret最多只能输入50字"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_upload",
                  key: "uploadFile",
                  title: "请选择上传图片",
                  isRequest: true,
                  uploadNum: 3, // 文件数量,默认为1，多张图片以，号拼接字符串形式提交
                  fileSizeLimit: 3, // 文件大小  以兆为单位
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "选择上传的文件不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_upload",
                  key: "uploadFile1",
                  title: "请选择上传图片",
                  isRequest: true,
                  uploadNum: 3, // 文件数量,默认为1，多张图片以，号拼接字符串形式提交
                  fileSizeLimit: 3, // 文件大小  以兆为单位
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "选择上传的文件不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  type: "v_upload",
                  key: "uploadFile2",
                  title: "请选择上传图片",
                  isRequest: true,
                  uploadNum: 3, // 文件数量,默认为1，多张图片以，号拼接字符串形式提交
                  fileSizeLimit: 3, // 文件大小  以兆为单位
                  validators: {
                    notEmpty: {
                      enabled: true,
                      message: "选择上传的文件不能为空"
                    }
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      },
      tableOption: {
        tableId: "proofreport",
        tableName: "凭据统计报表",
        url: config.pgyerApiUrl + NewApi.GetAppInfoList.options.url,
        method: NewApi.GetAppInfoList.options.method,
        uniqueId: TableUniqueId,
        actions: [
          {
            key: "tableEdit",
            title: "编辑",
            url: NewApi.GetAppInfoById,
            method: NewApi.GetAppInfoById.method,
            // params: {
            //   aaa: "fff"
            // },
            tabIdx: 2
          },
          {
            key: "tablePause",
            statuKey: "isDelete",
            // statuObj: {
            //   'false': "启用",
            //   'true': "禁用"
            // },
            title: "启用/禁用",
            tabIdx: 0
          },
          {
            key: "tableDownload",
            url: NewApi.GetAppXMLDownLoadUrl,
            method: NewApi.GetAppXMLDownLoadUrl.method,
            title: "下载",
            tabIdx: 1
          }
        ],
        columns: [
          {
            field: "organiztionSN",
            title: "产品编码",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "appKey",
            title: "产品名称",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "appSecret",
            title: "生产批号",
            align: "center"
          },
          {
            field: "terminalType",
            title: "上传日期",
            align: "center",
            formatter: function(val, row) {
              return TerminalType[row.terminalType];
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    rowClick: function(rowItem, element, baseObject) {
      console.log(element);
      let _ = this;
      if (element.id == "tablePause") {
        NewApi.UpdateDeleteStatus;
        let currentAction = _.tableOption.actions.find(item => {
          return item.key == element.id;
        });
        let param = {};
        param["isDelete"] = rowItem[currentAction.statuKey] ? 0 : 1;
        param[_.tableOption.uniqueId] = rowItem[_.tableOption.uniqueId];

        NewApi.UpdateDeleteStatus(param).then(res => {
          baseObject.$refs.table.operation("refresh");
        });
      }
    },
    componentMountBefore: function(element, basepage) {
      debugger;
    },
    componentMountAfter: function(element, basepage) {},
     // 编辑模态框中  组件值发生变化
    componentValueChange: function(element, basepage) {
      let editChildArr = basepage.$refs.editModule.$refs.child || [];
      if (element.options.key == "organiztionId") {
        let target = editChildArr.find(item => {
          return item.options.key == "appSecret";
        });
        target.setValue(element.val);
        // debugger;
      }
    }
  },
  components: { vBasePage }
};
</script>
